replies.bodyText:
Changed as suggested.
I can follow this up in a cleanup for all JDBC tests since all JDBC TestingServers do implement SqlExecutor's execute(sql) but don't explicitly implement that interface.
Would be nice to be consistent and encapsulate the behavior where possible.
replies.author: hashhar
